channel.title: World of Warcraft
channel.description: Does anyone currently play it? I searched and didn't find any threads about it, o.O.

item.title: World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Your average middle schooler will play runescape

Middle schoolers won’t survive with how serious WoW gets at endgame.

item.title: World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:11, topic:521581”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640094.msg4313942#msg4313942 date=1371158468]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=640094.msg4313921#msg4313921 date=1371155843]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640094.msg4313862#msg4313862 date=1371151923]

WoW is like RS and is just pretty much dead(or at least the good community )
[/quote]Not really.
[/quote]rephrase

[quote]the older people portion of the majority of the good community [/quote] Now it’s just all 13=15 year olds for the most part not to say there is the random older person.

Almost all of my friends on WoW are over 18 and those are just people I met in tradechat and in rbgs…
[/quote]you probably just got lucky it’s sort of like on here…flame_ is fairly new he got mod already yet all the vets don’t have it. (there is a reason but you see my point )

There are infact a lot of adults, a guild on 1 of my realms is called Old Fogey Federation and it’s aimed at adults.[/quote]that means nothing lol there are rs clans as well that are just for the “mature” ages… ALL games will have stuff like this. I am talking about a general term of “older people not playing”

Read full topic

item.title: World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:11, topic:521581”]There are infact a lot of adults, a guild on 1 of my realms is called Old Fogey Federation and it’s aimed at adults.[/quote]That’s because they’re slimming and trying to keep it to where they don’t have to talk with a bunch of children all the time.

Read full topic
